title: Introducing: Kota Banks
body:
Was a big fan of _N._

_F.F.A_, the ludicrously addictive debut from Sydney’s **Kota Banks**, and she’s subsequently followed it up with another jam, in the form of a feature on _Come Thru_, the latest track from fellow Aussie **Kailo**. Bolshy synths and some almost Prince-esque vibes dominate the track. Check out both tracks below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
